articles.title: Hong Kong star Louis Koo to launch China-Korean girl group Skyle this month - The Star Online
articles.description: The actor has formed a four-member girl group, selected from auditions held all over Asia.
articles.content:
Actor and film producer Louis Koo has formed a four-member girl group Skyle, which will make its debut in mid-July.
